attributes.action: Rescind the new mandatory requirement for face masks in shops
attributes.additional_details:
A mask does nothing to prevent the spread of COVID-19, and is being used as a social control apparatus. 
Nobody should be made to wear a mask.
attributes.background:
From the 24th July it will be mandatory to wear a face mask in a shop in the UK with the threat of a £100 fine for non Compliance. 
Nobody should be made to wear a mask. No evidence based scientific justification has been published as to their effectiveness.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Don't make the wearing of face masks compulsory in public places in England: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/331174

Repeal the decision to implement compulsory face coverings in English shops: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/331430

Make the use of masks on public transport voluntary and not mandatory: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/325079
